import{auth}from'../firebase/config';// firebase imports
import{signOut}from'firebase/auth';import useProvider from'./useProvider';var useLogout=function useLogout(){var _useProvider=useProvider(),dispatch=_useProvider.dispatch;var logout=function logout(){signOut(auth).then(function(res){console.log('user logged out');dispatch({type:'LOGOUT'});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};return{logout:logout};};export default useLogout;
